Verb *switch*
**************

Documentation for the switch verb in */cmds/verbs/switch.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``switch to <board topic>``
 |  ``switch in <something> to <state>``

 Switch to a differenr board topic, switch the status to off.
